Game Version will still stay v2.0.2.2 so to change that go to your game folder than go to "left4dead2" folder find "steam.inf" (Left4Dead2 -> Left4Dead2 -> steam.inf) open it change PatchVersion=2.0.2.2 to PatchVersion=2.0.2.3close it save


PatchVersion=2.0.2.2
ProductName=left4dead2
appID=550

PatchVersion=2.0.2.3
ProductName=left4dead2
appID=550
